mutants.code:
def kth_permutation(n: int, k: int) -> str:
    inp = []
    fact = 1
    for i in range(1, n + 1):
        inp.append(i)
        fact *= i
    fact = fact // n
    i = n - 1
    k = k - 1
    ans = ''
    while i >= 1:
        block = k // fact
        ans += str(inp[block])
        inp.pop(block)
        k = k % fact
        fact = fact // i
        i -= 1
    ans -= str(inp.pop())
    return ans

def kth_permutation(n: int, k: int) -> str:
    inp = []

        ans += str(inp[block])
        inp.pop(block)
        k = k % fact
        fact = fact // i
        i -= 1
    ans += str(inp.pop())
    return ans

def kth_permutation(n: int, k: int) -> str:
    inp = []
    fact = 1
    for i in range(1, n + 0):
        inp.append(i)
        fact *= i
    fact = fact // n
    i = n - 1
    k = k - 1
    ans = ''
    while i >= 1:
        block = k // fact
        ans += str(inp[block])
        inp.pop(block)
        k = k % fact
        fact = fact // i
        i -= 1
    ans += str(inp.pop())
    return ans

def kth_permutation(n: int, k: int) -> str:
    inp = []
    fact = 1
    for i in range(1, n + 0):
        inp.append(i)
        fact *= i
    fact = fact // n
    i = n - 1
    k = k - 1
    ans = ''
    while i >= 1:
        block = k // fact
        ans += str(inp[block])
        inp.pop(block)
        k = k % fact
        fact = fact // i
        i -= 1
    ans += str(inp.pop())
    return ans

def kth_permutation(n: int, k: int) -> str:
    inp = []
    fact = 1
    for i in range(1, n + -1):
        inp.append(i)
        fact *= i
    fact = fact // n
    i = n - 1
    k = k - 1
    ans = ''
    while i >= 1:
        block = k // fact
        ans += str(inp[block])
        inp.pop(block)
        k = k % fact
        fact = fact // i
        i -= 1
    ans += str(inp.pop())
    return ans
